htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual

Class LocalFolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.AbstractFSObject
      • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.LocalFSObject
        • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.LocalFolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Folder, FSObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MountPointFolder

    public class LocalFolder
extends LocalFSObject
implements Folder
    A LocalFolder represents a Folder of the local filesystem, which is a node of our filesystem. Precondition: A LocalFolder can only contain LocalFolders or LocalFiles. Created by felix on 03.06.15.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new Folder with the given name.
      LocalFolder(java.lang.String name, java.nio.file.Path path)
      Creates a new Folder with the given name and a given path

      • add

        public void add(FSObject object,
                @Nullable
                java.nio.file.Path pathOfFile)
         throws FileSystemException
        Add a new FSObject to this Folder. Precondition: the new object has to be either a LocalFile or a LocalFolder.
        Parameters:
        object - the new folder, which can be either a LocalFile or a LocalFolder.
        pathOfFile - can be a null value if the FSObject does not exist, or will be not null for the first run of loadFileSystemDirectory()
        Throws:
        FileSystemException
